document.full_text: until now, laurent gbagbo refused to consider stepping down after losing his election last year, defying global condemnation and sanctions. in the end, it came down to force.
document.title: ivory coast leader swayed by force as he considers exit
lines_and_colors: until now, laurent gbagbo refused to consider stepping down after losing his election last year, defying global condemnation and sanctions. in the end, it came down to force.
